commit.message:
re PR middle-end/35136 (ICE caused by address calculation with loop variable when optimization is on)

	PR middle-end/35136
	* gimplify.c (force_gimple_operand_bsi): Move SSA renaming code from
	here to...
	(force_gimple_operand): ...here.

From-SVN: r132267
